sentence.Network_en: The pictures provide irrefutable evidence of the incident.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些照片为这起事件提供了不容辩驳的证据。

sentence.Network_en: These ironclad details are irrefutable proof in black and white.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Newspaper Running List 3-:- Flash cards... ... 友谊 friendship 颠扑不破 irrefutable 皆 all.
无字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 无可言状〖 unspeakableness〗 无可争辩〖 indisputable;unquestionable;irrefutable;incontestable〗.
list 6 ... intricacy 复杂性 irrefutable 无可辩驳的 jargon 行话， 专业术语.
This is an irrefutable fact ., 这是一个无可辩驳的事实.

list.abs: in the face of such irrefutable facts , he was struck dumb ., 在这样确凿的事实面前 , 他惊得哑口无言.
soon for example , there will be irrefutable proof that you are not alone in this Universe .例如不久，将会有不能反驳的证据，你们在这宇宙里不是孤独的。
On the basis of irrefutable evidence he was sent to jail ., 基于确凿的证据 , 他被判入狱.
... 不论 regardless of;no matter what 不易之论 irrefutable argument;unalterable truth;perfectly sound proposition.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from late Latin irrefutabilis, from in- 'not' + refutabilis (from refutare 'repel, rebut')

entry.tran: 无可辩驳的;不能推翻的;不容否认的
entry.def: Irrefutable evidence, statements, or arguments cannot be shown to be incorrect or unsatisfactory.

example.ex: The pictures provide irrefutable evidence of the incident...
example.tran: 这些照片为这起事件提供了不容辩驳的证据。

auth_sentence.content: The data is on the table and irrefutable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The data is on the table and irrefutable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The data is on the table and irrefutable.

auth_sentence.content: The fact that it is changing is irrefutable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fact that it is changing is irrefutable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fact that it is changing is irrefutable.

auth_sentence.content: There is irrefutable proof that men and women are biologically different.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is irrefutable proof that men and women are biologically different.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is irrefutable proof that men and women are biologically different.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不顾的, 不考虑的, 无关的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不,无+respective各自的→adj.不顾的, 不考虑的, 无关的
ir不,无+reproachable能被指责的→adj.无可指责的
ir不,无+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
ir不,无+resolute果断的→adj.无决断力的
ir不,无+refutable可反驳的→adj.无可反驳的
ir不,无+revocable可取消的→adj.不可取消的
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rupt断+ion表名词→打断[别人]→闯入
ir不+regularity整齐, 匀称→n.不规则,无规律
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rig水+ate表动词→进水→灌溉
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rit擦+ate表动词→进入磨擦→激怒
ir使……,成为,进入,再+radi光线+ate表动词→发光→生辉
